problems.prompt: Arrange the events of early American history in the correct order.

blocks.code: The Pilgrims establish the Plymouth Colony.
The American colonies declare independence from Britain.
Christopher Columbus arrives in the Americas.
The U.S. Constitution is written and signed.

problems.prompt: Order the major events of the French Revolution.

blocks.code: The storming of the Bastille takes place.

problems.prompt: Put these Ancient World events in the right sequence.

blocks.code: The Great Pyramid of Giza is built.
Alexander the Great conquers much of the known world.
Hammurabi creates one of the first written law codes.
